title: My instalation of Thunderbird does not send emails
content:
See the screen shots attached.

I have checked with Dodo, they have tried a number of variations, but NO emails will go.

It must be a problem with Thunderbird, they say.

Can you help.
creator: halosman

title: Newbie Questions from ex-Forte Agent User
content:
I and my 27 years of emails have finally moved from Forte Agent and POP to Thunderbird and IMAP, and we're climbing the learning curve.

If I accidentally delete an email, is there an easier way to restore it than rummaging through the Trash?

Is there any way to route all emails from a person to a folder, other than a filter? (Agent can associate an email address with a folder when their email is moved to it.)
creator: Toolworker

title: Godaddy acount to open in thunderbird
content:
I tried to update my godaddy domain account to operate with my Thunderbird email client. Godaddy now uses Microsoft 365 as the set up interface and it has required changed in the setup, which i followed.

The changes were successful on my desktop, however, when I set up my laptop using the identical information, I couldn not receive emails to my inbox. I can request emails and it does send log on information, but no emails appear. I can successfully send emails from this account to other addresses.


Settings I used are: POP 3 server name - outlook.office365.com port 995 user name - barry@bbongiovi.com connection - SSL/TLS Auth - OAuth2

I had the same results when trying to set up with IMAP

Please help! Barry Bongiovi
creator: barrybongiovi

title: Lost all my files, contracts, message rules, accounts....Happens everytime I donate
content:
Why after I donate, thunderbird loses all my files, contracts, message rules, accounts....Happens everytime I donate....losing motivation here. The "fix" is not easy to find either....what gives? Please don't update me anymore.....

This is the third time I have had to fix this. Please help.
creator: scottdp3
